extensionDescription.message: Use this extension to synchronize bookmarks and tabs with a self-hosted server.

optionsBTNImportHint.message: Restore from server, overwrite local bookmarks.

optionsBTNExportHint.message: Overwrite all bookmarks on the server.

optionsNotUsed.message: You can now synchronize bookmarks from the server.

optionsErrorURL.message: Login failed: Please check the WebDAV URL. It should be in a form like https://servername/folder

optionsErrorUser.message: Login failed: Please check username and password.

optionsBeforeCImpExp.message: Here you can store or restore your current settings.

optionsBeforeLogin.message: Please log in with your credentials to receive an access code.

optionsWrongAData.message: Login error. Please log in again

infoRestoreID.message: Do you want to restore the Client ID?
infoRestoreID.description: Question if you want to restore the client id

optionsBeforeImport.message: Should all local bookmarks be deleted before import?

optionsBeforeExport.message:
All bookmarks are deleted at the server before exporting. Afterwards the new bookmarks are exported to the server.

Should the remote bookmarks be deleted before the export?
optionsBeforeExport.description: Description that all remote bookmarks are deleted

optionsInfoRemove.message:
When you continue, all your current bookmarks are removed.

Are you sure to delete all local bookmarks?

popupImportConfirm.message: The bookmarks stored on the server are now added. Are you sure?

errorGetBookmarks.message: There was a error retrieving the bookmarks from the server. The status response is:

errorSaveBookmarks.message: There was some error saving all bookmarks. The status response is:

errorSaveSingleBookmarks.message: There was a error saving the bookmark to PHP. The status response is:
errorSaveSingleBookmarks.description: http error when saving single bookmark.

errorExportBookmarks.message: There was a problem exporting the bookmarks.

errorImportBookmark.message: There was a error importing the bookmark:

errorRemoveBookmark.message: There was some error removing the bookmark.

errorEditBookmark.message: There was some error editing the bookmark at the server.

errorMoveBookmark.message: There was some error moving the bookmark at the PHP server. The status response is:

successExportBookmarks.message: Local bookmarks successfully added at server.

internalError.message: An internal error is occurred. The message was:

infoNewClient.message: This browser is a new client and is now registered at the server.
infoNewClient.description: New Client, unknown to the server.

infoNoChange.message: 0 added, moved, deleted bookmarks in last sync.
infoNoChange.description: Message if no data has changed on the server.

infoChanges.message: changes on the server since the last sync.
infoChanges.description: Message if no data has changed on the server.

infoEmptyConfig.message: Configuration is empty. Please configure the AddOn before use.
infoEmptyConfig.description: Message if extension is not configured yet.

backendType.message: Choose between PHP and WebDAV server

toBackend.message: Send Bookmark directly and manual to the server

optionsRestoreServer.message: The following clients can be restored from the server. Please select a client from the list or click on cancel to not use any of these clients.
